import React from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Scroll from './../Scroll/Scroll' import './Settings.css'; class Holidays extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { rHolidayList: [ ], nrHolidayList: [ ], newNRshow: false, newRshow: false, sShow: false, currentHoliday: '' } } toggleNRShow = () => { this.setState({newNRshow: !this.state.newNRshow}); } toggleRShow = () => { this.setState({newRshow: !this.state.newRshow}); } toggleSShow = (e) => { if (typeof e !== 'undefined'){ this.setState({currentHoliday: e.target.parentNode.id}); } this.setState({sShow: !this.state.sShow}); } render(){ const {newNRshow, newRshow, sShow} = this.state; return(
